snippet.title: Crystal Story: The Hero and the Evil Witch - Full Trailer
snippet.description:
The full trailer for Crystal Story: The Hero and the Evil Witch.

Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1300190/Crystal_Story_The_Hero_and_the_Evil_Witch/
Android - Coming Soon

An evil witch has stolen the Crystal of Power. It’s up to one brave hero to save the world... by hiring mercenaries to do the job for him. Play as the members of Mercenary Inc as you explore randomly generated dungeons, battle fierce monsters, and collect loot in this 2.5D turn-based RPG.

MUSIC

MDKSound
https://twitter.com/mdkofficial

CAST

Aimee Smith 
https://twitter.com/AimeeSmithVA

Caleb Yen 
https://twitter.com/caleb1yen

Christian O'Boyle 
https://twitter.com/voiceofoboyle

Dottovu 
https://twitter.com/dottovuu

pickle131 
https://twitter.com/pickle131vaa

WRITING CONSULTATION
Hannah McLean 
https://twitter.com/HannahLMcLean

LOGO
Re.Alice

Cover Art
RII
https://twitter.com/crisbychicken


Please follow! Thanks!
https://www.facebook.com/CrystalStoryGame/
https://twitter.com/CrystalStoryRPG
https://discord.gg/dybgwMv
